abilities.name: Fire Form.
abilities.description: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

abilities.name: Illumination.
abilities.description: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 ft..

abilities.name: Water Susceptibility.
abilities.description: For every 5 ft. the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.
